page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: Most people live in detached, semi_ detached, terraced houses and flats. In Blackness 750 houses have or will be built which will all be privately owned. There are 3 council estates in this area _ Alderbrook, Palesgate Lane and Forest Rise. Tenants have recently been encouraged to buy their own houses. 32 new homes are being con_ structed for private ownership off Eridge Road. It is easier to get planning permission for infilling as it goes to an elected committee at Wealden. An acre of land costs between Â£50_100,000 on which approximately ten houses can be built or a greater number of flats. In Blackness there are a number of 2_3 storey flats. Rotherfield is a conservation area so no houses may be demolished without permission. 44 Tudor & Sussex houses are being built in Court Meadow.
